title: 34 Bus both directions:parade
description: NJ Transit Bus: due to parade both directions, 34 Bus area of Bloomfield Ave At Church St (Montclair Twp) Bloomfield Avenue will be closed between North Fullerton and Valley Road due to a Fourth of July parade. During this time, NJ TRANSIT Bus Route No. 34 will operate on a detour as follows: Buses traveling toward Newark will travel from Grove Street and Glen Ridge Avenue, make a right on Glen Ridge Avenue, right on Pine Street, right on Bloomfield Avenue, left on Elm Street, and then continue the regular route. Buses traveling toward Montclair/Willowbrook will travel from Elm Street and Bloomfield Avenue, continue across Bloomfield Avenue to Grove Street, and then layover on Grove Street. Bus stops may be lost, and minor delays are expected during this detour. Please read the above detour directions carefully and allow for extra travel time., Friday July 4th, 2025, 10:00 AM thru 02:00 PM

description: NJ Transit Rail: due to Construction both directions Northeast Corridor Line at Metropark (Woodbridge Twp) Metropark Station: Traffic Adjustments ï¿½ Effective Monday, June 9, 2025 Please be advised of the following traffic pattern changes at Metropark Station, due to construction: Passenger Pick-Up and Drop-Off will be located on the ground floor of the West Parking Garage. Taxi and Rideshare will be located on the ground floor of the East Parking Garage. Bus Stop locations will remain the same. During this time, we ask that customers be aware of the construction activity and follow all posted signage. Please allow for extra travel time. We appreciate your patience during this temporary adjustment.

title: Montclair-Boonton Line both directions:Construction
description: NJ Transit Rail: due to Construction both directions, Montclair-Boonton Line between Bay Street (Montclair Twp) and Hoboken (Hoboken) Customers traveling to Hoboken will change trains at Secaucus. Connecting trains will arrive at Hoboken up to 41 minutes later than the regular train from Newark Broad Street. Customers traveling from Hoboken will travel to Secaucus to connect with trains operating to Bay Street. Connecting trains will depart Hoboken eight minutes later than usual, except as noted below: Train 513, the 6:08 AM departure from Hoboken to Bay Street, will be replaced by aNJ TRANSIT bus departing Hoboken at 6:15 AM. This bus will make all regular rail stops (Newark Broad Street, Watsessing Avenue, Bloomfield Glen Ridge and Bay Street). Customers who normally use Train 545 from Hoboken will use shuttle Train 9145 to Secaucus. Train 9145 operates 11 minutes earlier than Train 545. Customers who normally use Train 509 (last train) from Hoboken may use either shuttle Train 9109 (1:15 AM departure) or Train 1701 (1:32 AM departure)., Continuous Saturday June 28th, 2025 05:00 AM thru Monday June 30th, 2025 03:00 AM

title: Systemwide :Special event
description: NYC Ferry: due to Special event, operational activity Systemwide Until 11:59 PM on September 02,2025 the new Summer schedules will go into effect on Monday, June 30th to accommodate changes in weekend ridership. It is as follows: Beginning Friday, July 4th, the Rockaway route will operate more frequently on weekends and holidays. The Rockaway Rocket is back! Starting July 4th weekend, the Rockaway Rocket will return to provide peak weekend beach service from Long Island City and Greenpoint. Visit the Rockaway Rocket webpage to learn more and use the NYC Ferry app to purchase tickets. On select weekend days, a point-to-point shuttle will operate between Red Hook/Atlantic Basin and Wall St./Pier 11 to accommodate cruise-related demand. Shuttle days and departure times are listed in the South Brooklyn Modified Weekend schedule below. A weekend schedule will operate on: 9/1/2025

title: 40 Bus southbound:Construction
description: NJ Transit Bus: due to Construction, Construction, southbound 40 Bus area of Kellogg St 290' E Of Corbin St (Newark) Until 11:59 PM on September 15,2025 Effective Monday, September 16, 2024, and continuing until Monday, September 15, 2025, Kellogg and Marlin streets will be closed between Corbin and Distribution streets due to long-term construction.  During this time, NJ TRANSIT Bus Route No. 40 will operate on a detour as follows:      Buses traveling toward Jersey Garden Mall will travel from Doremus Avenue and Distribution Street, continue on Distribution Street, right on Marlin Street, left on Port Street, bear right on Corbin Street, and then continue the regular route.     Buses traveling toward North Arlington will not be affected.    Bus stops will be lost and minor delays expected during this detour. Please read the above detour directions carefully, and allow for extra travel time.
